metadata.name: The Calendar – 2023
metadata.description:
"The Calendar" is an interactive piece evolving throughout 2023. 

It is a collaboration between 14 photographers : Alex Mack, Eric Boockford, Gregory Berg, Bryan Garrison, Chad Torkelsen, Ethan Lington, Saige Carlson, Jess Licata, Austin Visual, Casey Joiner, Isa Rus, KJ Brent, Quentin Carlier, Kristopher Shinn.

Each month the piece will showcase two exclusive images, for a grand total of 24 images in 2023. 
The NFT will also change over the course of the day, displaying a specific image during daytime and another at night. 

Every month, the holders of “The Calendar” will have the opportunity to mint each exclusive image to their wallet (price/quantity may vary between drop).

To display the token full screen : https://ipfs.io/ipfs/bafybeibvciuv3humdmcowa4pd72qiojinzczsv7d7mtpof4hwjkbyye2ey/
